page.title: 01A Review Of The Area
page.content: There are 3 small villages in the block, all of which are reasonably traffic free. However, outside the villages there are a few very busy roads. There is the{A505}and the{M11 and there is also a{Cambridge to {London main railway line.}There are 4 churches, 3 schools and some farms in our block, proving that farming is a common occupation. Woodland covers large sections of our block. There is a public footpath from Whittlesford to Thriplow. There are 3 industrial firms -{Volvo British Motors, Ciba {Geigy Agro Chemicals,}and{Smart's Mill (which stores grain). {Duxford Airfield}is part of the Imperial War Museum. The housing is centered on the 3 villages, and the 4x3 km block is not thickly populated.
